Magazine Design Philosophy

The Magazine layout uses dynamic grids and visual hierarchy to create an engaging reading experience. It's perfect for content creators who want to showcase multiple stories and features.

With its prominent featured content and sidebar highlights, this layout encourages exploration and discovery.

View Minimalist Layout

Layout Features

  • Dynamic grid layouts
  • Featured content highlights
  • Visual content hierarchy
  • Content discovery focus
